content: **knitted jumper for babies and children in drops air the piece is worked top down with garter stitch sizes 6 months 8 years ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ai-004-by yarn group c or a + a ----------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 - 5/6 - 7/8 years the size is approx equivalent to the child s height in cm 68/74 - 80/86 92 - 98/104 - 110/116 - 122/128 **materials** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-150 150-200-200-200 g colour 10 fog **knitting gauge ** 16 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 5 5 mm length 60 cm or 80 cm for garter stitch drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 60 cm or 80 cm for rib drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm for neck needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
